title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. I, subch. C, art. 2 - Issuance of Certificates and Permits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. I, subch. C, art. 2 - Issuance of Certificates and Permits

State Regulations

Part 21 - Gas, Electric, Steam, Waterworks, Telegraph And Telephone Corporations And Municipalities (ยง 21.1 to 21.10)

Part 22 - Repealed (ยง 22.1 to 22.3)

Part 23 - Repealed (ยง 23.1 to 23.3)

Part 24 - Repealed (ยง 24.1 to 24.3)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. I, subch. C, art. 2

Forms for the issuance of a certificate of authority to act
as a contract carrier of passengers may be obtained from the Department of

Public Service. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
